thread.title: German parties at odds ahead of coalition talks

title: German parties at odds ahead of coalition talks
text:
German parties at odds ahead of coalition talks   01:38 
German Chancellor Angela Merkel is under pressure to form a government, more than three months after an indecisive election result. But as preliminary talks with the Social Democrats begin the two sides are trading barbs over a series of issues.   
German Chancellor Angela Merkel is under pressure to form a government, more than three months after an indecisive election result. But as preliminary talks with the Social Democrats begin the two sides are trading barbs over a series of issues.  //reut.rs/2AhgZ74
